section.title: Testing libCellML
section.paragraph: If you wish to test some new code without having to create a pull request you can. Buildbot has the capacity to build a libCellML compliant repository through the use of a ForceScheduler . To make use of this facility, you will need to authenticate with the Buildbot system. Access granted on request to David Nickerson d.nickerson@auckland.ac.nz. The Buildbot system uses MD5 encrypted passwords as created by htpasswd. With your request to David include the output of this command:
The website http://www.htaccesstools.com/htpasswd-generator/ can be used if you do not have access to the htpasswd application.
When your request has been dealt with, you will be able to login to libCellML Buildbot and submit code for testing.
